channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sametime
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sametime

item.title: CVE-2016-2965|2024-09-17T00:46:21.638Z -- ibm -- sametime
item.description: IBM Sametime Meeting Server 8.5.2 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a user to visit a malicious link, a remote attacker could force the user to log out of Sametime. IBM X-Force ID: 113846.

item.title: CVE-2016-10503|2024-09-17T04:10:32.358Z -- ibm -- sametime
item.description: IBM Sametime Meeting Server 8.5.2 and 9.0 could allow an authenticated and invited user of Sametime meeting to lower any or all hands in an e-meeting, thus spoofing results of votes in the meeting. IBM X-Force ID: 113803.

item.title: CVE-2016-2980|2024-09-17T02:46:58.231Z -- ibm -- sametime
item.description: The Sametime WebPlayer 8.5.2 and 9.0 is vulnerable to a script injection where a malicious site can inject their own script by exploiting a vulnerability in the way that the WebPlayer works. IBM X-Force ID: 113993.

item.title: CVE-2016-2969|2024-09-17T03:47:54.438Z -- ibm -- sametime
item.description: IBM Sametime Meeting Server 8.5.2 and 9.0 may send replies that contain emails of people that should not be in these messages. IBM X-Force ID: 113850.

item.title: CVE-2016-2970|2024-09-17T02:06:38.953Z -- ibm -- sametime
item.description: IBM Sametime 8.5 and 9.0 meetings server may provide detailed information in an error message that may provide details about the application to possible attackers. IBM X-Force ID: 113851.

item.title: CVE-2016-2973|2024-09-17T01:26:28.459Z -- ibm -- sametime
item.description: IBM Sametime Media Services 8.5.2 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 113899.

item.title: CVE-2016-2975|2024-09-17T00:50:57.825Z -- ibm -- sametime
item.description: IBM Sametime 8.5.2 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 113935.
